description: Retrieve and display the most recent unread email in the inbox
Search emails using various filters (sender, keywords, time range, attachments, subject)
Create a new email with specified recipients, subject, and body, then send it
Compose an email and save it as a draft without sending
Compose an email with file attachment(s) and send it
Create an email to be automatically sent at a specified future time
Show the full content and metadata of a specific email including attachments
Compose and send a reply to a specific email
Forward a specific email to new recipient(s)
Send to primary, CC, and BCC recipients
Move emails between folders, apply labels, or flag emails as important
Remove a specific email from the current folder
Download all attachments from a specific email
Compose an email with formatting (bold, italic, lists)
Translate the content of an email to a different language
Compose an email with a table
